extension-point.name: PDF XSLT stylesheet (convert merged middle file) inclusion
Inclusion for build_transoform_template.xml for above 'depends.ï½ž' targets.
Inclusion for AF Formatter execution parameter.

param.name: style.def.file
param.desc: Style definition file

param.name: include.frontmatter.to.toc
param.desc: Specifies whether to include frontmatter topicref in toc.

param.name: add.numbering.title.prefix
param.desc: Specifies whether to add numbering to topic/table/fig.

param.name: add.part.to.title
param.desc: Specifies whether to add Part/Chapter literal

param.name: add.thumbnail.index
param.desc: Specifies wheter to add thumbnail index

param.name: assume.sortas.pinyin
param.desc: Specifies whether to treate index-sort-as pinyin readings

param.name: xml.lang
param.desc: Specify base xsml:lang

param.name: make.see.link
param.desc: Specifies whether to generate links for index-see

param.name: output.draft.comment
param.desc: Specifies whether to output draft-comment

param.name: output.required.cleanup
param.desc: Specifies whether to output required-cleanup

param.name: use.oid
param.desc: Specifies whether to adopt @oid as topic/@id

param.name: format.dl.as.block
param.desc: Specifies whether to format dl element as block

param.name: debug.style
param.desc: Specifies whether to output style debugging information

param.name: sort.glossentry
param.desc: Specifies whether to sort glossentry

param.name: output.start.message
param.desc: Specifies whether to output start message of plug-in stylesheet

param.name: auto.scale.down.to.fit
param.desc: Specifies whether to apply auto-scale-down to block image

param.name: make.toc.for.map
param.desc: Specifies whether to generate toc for map

param.name: make.index.for.map
param.desc: Specifies whether to generate index for map

param.name: make.alt.text
param.desc: Specifies whether to generate alt-text for image

param.name: paper.size
param.desc: Specifies the output paper-size

param.name: make.alt.text
param.desc: Specifies whether to generate alt-text for image

param.name: image.in.output.folder
param.desc: Specifies whether to copy images into output folder

param.name: output.crop.region
param.desc: Specifies whether to output crop region

param.name: output.type
param.desc: Specifies output type such as 'web','print-color','print-monochrome'

param.name: doc.type
param.desc: Specifies document type such as 'UM' (User's manual), 'IM' (Installation manual)

param.name: brand.type
param.desc: Specifies brand type for publication

param.name: exclude.cover.from.counting.page
param.desc: Specifies whether to exclude cover for page count

param.name: number.equation.block.unconditionally
param.desc: Specifies whether to number <equation-block> unconditionally

param.name: exclude.auto.numbering.from.equation.figure
param.desc: Specifies wheteher to exclude <equation-block> in <equation-figure> in unconditionally numbering mode

param.name: assume.equation.number.as.auto
param.desc: Specifies wheteher to assume all <equation-number> as auto

param.name: display.fn.at.end.of.topic
param.desc: Specifies wheteher to output footnote at the end of topic

param.name: use.i18n.index.lib
param.desc: Specifies wheteher to use I18N Index Library

param.name: debug.index
param.desc: Specifies wheteher to output index sorting debug information

param.name: adopt.mathml.alttext
param.desc: Specifies wheteher to adopt m:math/alttext in text mode processing

param.name: enable.landscape.page
param.desc: Enable topic level landscape page layout

param.name: output.table.title.continued
param.desc: Output 'Continued' word in table title

param.name: output.table.footer.continued
param.desc: Output 'Continued' word in table footer

param.name: output.index
param.desc: Specifies wheteher to output index

param.name: add.map.title.to.bookmark
param.desc: Add map title to top of the bookmark

param.name: use.index.common.xslt3
param.desc: Specifies the XSLT 3.0 index common build.

param.name: fo.in.output.folder
param.desc: Specifies the final FO file location. The default value is output folder, otherwise it is in temporary folder.

param.name: ahf.dir
param.desc: Specifies AH Formatter directory

param.name: ahf.opt
param.desc: Specifies AH Formatter option setting file

param.name: last.pageseq.id
param.desc: Specifies the last fo:page-sequence/@id value

param.name: last.pageseq.offset
param.desc: Specifies the last fo:page-sequence minus offset
